Class PasswordUtilTest

java.lang.Object
password.PasswordUtilTest
public class PasswordUtilTest extends Object
Unit tests for the PasswordUtil class.

This test class verifies the correct functionality of the password hashing and verification methods in PasswordUtil by checking various scenarios such as valid hashes, incorrect passwords, differing salts, and invalid hash formats.

Author:
Dhruv

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    testDifferentSalts()
    Tests the hashPassword method to ensure that different salts are used for the same password across different hashing attempts, resulting in different hashes.
    void
    testHashFormat()
    Tests the hashPassword method to ensure that the generated hash contains a valid salt and hash separated by a single '$' delimiter.
    void
    testVerifyPasswordFailure()
    Tests the verifyPassword method to ensure failure when an incorrect password is provided.
    void
    testVerifyPasswordInvalidFormat()
    Tests the verifyPassword method to ensure that an invalid hash format triggers an IllegalArgumentException.
    void
    testVerifyPasswordSuccess()
    Tests the verifyPassword method to ensure successful verification when the correct password is provided.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • PasswordUtilTest

      public PasswordUtilTest()

  • Method Details

    • testHashFormat

      @Test public void testHashFormat()
      Tests the hashPassword method to ensure that the generated hash contains a valid salt and hash separated by a single '$' delimiter. Also verifies that the salt and hash are valid Base64 strings.

    • testVerifyPasswordSuccess

      @Test public void testVerifyPasswordSuccess()
      Tests the verifyPassword method to ensure successful verification when the correct password is provided.

    • testVerifyPasswordFailure

      @Test public void testVerifyPasswordFailure()
      Tests the verifyPassword method to ensure failure when an incorrect password is provided.

    • testDifferentSalts

      @Test public void testDifferentSalts()
      Tests the hashPassword method to ensure that different salts are used for the same password across different hashing attempts, resulting in different hashes.

    • testVerifyPasswordInvalidFormat

      @Test public void testVerifyPasswordInvalidFormat()
      Tests the verifyPassword method to ensure that an invalid hash format triggers an IllegalArgumentException.
